subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 27 points, his greatest output since Jan. 20, and dazzled in a furious fourth-quarter rally, only to have the Knicks get routed by the Spurs.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 27 points, his greatest output since Jan. 20, and dazzled in a furious fourth-quarter rally, only to have the Knicks get routed by the Spurs.
